possible_violations.violation_name: Breach of Frontex Code of Conduct

records.context_note: On 17.04.2024, during a weapon handover, a SC Officer noticed a discrepancy in the number of bullets. The officer admitted not consistently counting bullets before/after shifts due to operational constraints and suggested a possible mix-up. The SC Officer involved in the handover has since left the operational area. The incident is considered a breach of Frontex CoC.
records.evidence_quote: On 17.04.2024 [...] during the process of handing over the [...] a SC Officer noticed there were only bullets in instead of
